active.description: If set to 'false', the License Template is disabled. Licensee can not obtain any new Licenses off this License Template.

automatic.description: If set to 'true', every new Licensee automatically gets one License out of this License Template on creation. Automatic Licenses must have their price set to 0.

currency.description: Specifies currency for the License price. Check data types to discover which currencies are supported.

hidden.description: If set to 'true', this License Template is not shown in NetLicensing Shop as offered for purchase.

hideLicenses.description: If set to 'true', Licenses from this License Template are not visible to the end customer, but participate in validation.

licenseType.description: Type of Licenses created from this License Template. Supported types: FEATURE, TIMEVOLUME, FLOATING, QUANTITY

name.description: License Template name to create License Template object

number.description: Unique number (across all Products of a Vendor) that identifies the License Template. Vendor can assign this number when creating a License Template or let NetLicensing generate one. Read-only after creation of the first License from this License Template.

price.description: Price for the License. If >0, it must always be accompanied by the currency specification.

productModuleNumber.description: Number of Product Module to create License Template object
